column5: My best friend is my co-host & she runs it. Reasonably priced lower than a hotel night. This will be a 5 STAR experience for you. Sleep in late, checkout at noon. Clean & comfy private room and restroom for a night in Houston. 20 minutes from IAH airport. Just seconds away from gas stations/restaurants/shopping strips/movie theater & a bowling alley near by... plenty of options to choose from, very convenient!
